title: Wout van Aert Roars Back as Giro d’Italia’s Gravel Stage Blows Up GC, Isaac del Toro Powers to Pink Jersey
content:
Huge day of racing sees GC chaos as Del Toro takes over pink jersey, Roglič and Pidcock cede time to Ayuso and others.

Read the full article at Wout van Aert Roars Back as Giro d’Italia’s Gravel Stage Blows Up GC, Isaac del Toro Powers to Pink Jersey on Velo.
author: sstokes
